TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsCopyConstructed extends System.Object
public ref class IsCopyConstructed abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示複製這個型別的值時，必須使用此型別所提供的複製建構函式。

span.span: Indicates that any copying of values of this type must use the copy constructor provided by the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 修改任何型別類別必須實作方法，名為`MarshalCopy`呼叫原生的複製建構函式。Any type modified by the class must implement a method named `MarshalCopy` that calls the native copy constructor. 發出至中繼資料複製建構函式與任何原生 c + + 類型必須有封送處理的界限之間複製值時，由封送處理器呼叫這些方法。Any native C++ type that is emitted into metadata with copy constructors needs to have those methods called by the marshaler when copying values across the marshaling boundary. Microsoft c + + 編譯器修改方法參數中的所有原生 c + + 類型，並傳回有此修飾詞來觸發封送處理程式碼中的這個行為的型別。The Microsoft C++ compiler modifies all native C++ types in method parameters and return types that have this modifier to trigger this behavior in the marshaling code. 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更預設行為不適用時，在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器，處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的自訂修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以套用的自訂修飾詞來方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略的選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 您可以發出自訂修飾詞至中繼資料，使用下列技巧：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法類別如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`和`modreq`，然後將組合至檔案最[Ilasm.exe （IL 組譯工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
